Label: Purpose
Relation: To link items with a general, unspecified relationship to each other.

Label: Entry Guidelines
Relation: Enter only the ID of the related item(s).

Label: Commentary
Relation: This is one of several fields that describe how records relate to each other. This field is the most general and should be used when a more specific hierarchical (parent-child) or temporal (version, replaces) relationship cannot be defined.
